entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 2:26 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then periods of light snow. Blowing snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
